channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Poll Maker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Poll Maker

item.title: CVE-2021-24651|2024-08-03T19:35:20.416Z -- unknown -- poll%20maker
item.description: The Poll Maker WordPress plugin before 3.4.2 allows unauthenticated users to perform SQL injection via the ays_finish_poll AJAX action. While the result is not disclosed in the response, it is possible to use a timing attack to exfiltrate data such as password hash.
